items.summary: Create/replace the production sitemap at `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` with a valid non-empty XML sitemap (raw XML only), so that the Vite build outputs `dist/sitemap.xml` as a standalone static file (not an HTML page).

Fix static hosting / SPA fallback behavior so `/sitemap.xml` is never served by the SPA fallback (e.g., `index.html` or `404.html`) and never redirects; it must be publicly accessible as a static asset at exactly `/sitemap.xml`.
Ensure `/sitemap.xml` is served with the HTTP response header `Content-Type: application/xml` (or an equivalent XML MIME type accepted by Google), and is not served as `text/html`.
Populate `frontend/public/robots.txt` to publicly reference the sitemap at `/sitemap.xml` and ensure it is also emitted as a static file in `dist/robots.txt`.

Add/update deployment verification documentation to include explicit sitemap checks: verifying `dist/sitemap.xml` exists, requesting `/sitemap.xml` returns HTTP 200 with `Content-Type: application/xml`, and confirming the URL is not being served by SPA fallback HTML.
